竪字的基本解释

shù
见“竖”。

竪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shù］
“竖1”的繁体字。同“豎1”。

竪字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【立字部】　竪； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页872第17
【廣韻】臣庾切，音樹。立也。俗豎字。【說文】从豎。【廣韻】童僕之未冠者曰豎。【史記·酈生傳】沛公罵曰：竪儒。【註】竪，童僕之稱。沛公輕之，以比奴竪，故曰竪儒。　又姓。【山海經】帝命竪亥，步自東極，至於西極，五億十選九千八百步。【郭註】竪亥，健行人。　又國名。【山海經】在流沙外者，大夏竪沙居繇月支之國。　又去聲。【通鑑】龎涓曰：遂成竪子之名。【胡三省註】殊遇切，義同豎。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Li Zi Department] 　Vertical; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 872 17
[Guangyun] Chen Yuqie, sound tree. Li also. Vulgar vertical characters. [Said the text] from the vertical. [Guang Yun] The child servant who has not been crowned is called vertical. [Historical Records · Biography of Li Sheng] Pei Gong scolded and said: Confucianism. [Note] Vertical, known as the child servant. Pei Gong is light, and he is better than slaves, so it is called Confucianism.　Another last name. [Shanhaijing] The emperor ordered to erect the sea, step from the east pole, as for the west pole, nine thousand eight hundred steps selected from 500 million to ten. [Guo's Note] Shuhai, a hiker.　 Also the name of the country. [Shanhaijing] Those who are outside the quicksand, Da Xia Shusha resides in the country of the Yue branch.　Go again. [Tong Jian] Pang Juan said: Then it became the name of Zhuzi. [Hu Sanxing's Note] Special encounters are cut, but the meaning is the same.
